entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 then becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
